161.heading: King Features Syndicate.
161.title: Popeye Career Awareness Library. [Kit]
161.author: [No author]
notes: 15 comic books (col. ; 26 cm.), 15 poster cards (col. ; 29 x 36 cm.), and 15 job-description cards (9 x 15 cm.)

Summary: Using the familiar character Popeye, this kit describes these career fields: health, manufacturing, transportation, communications and media, construction, marketing and distribution, agri-business, marine science, environmental control, public services, personal services, hospitality and recreation, fine arts and humanities, consumer services, business and office.
